title: France panorama. [No. 72/14]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Press conference at the Elysee Palace - President Pompidou’s press conference. 2. In the news: The rural population - the latest statistics. University art - architectural decoration by Pillet at the Grenoble Science Faculty. 3. Sagittaire II - new simulated deep-sea trials at the Comex in Marseilles. Gromaire - the work of French painter Marcel Gromaire, who died in 1971.
